seap_section.title: Public Procurement Solutions (SEAP/SICAP)
seap_section.description: SEAP (Sistemul Electronic de Achizitii Publice) is Romania's official electronic public procurement platform, equivalent to TED/eSender in the EU. We specialize in navigating its complexity, providing full support for contracting authorities and economic operators.
features: Platform development integrated with SEAP APIs
